text:
447 schools across South Korea postponed their opening today due to fears of covid-19 infection. 

111 of those were in the capital Seoul.

However, 2.8 million students are in class today wearing masks and having their temperature taken. More are due to return next week. https://t.co/2cWfJLmn59

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
